newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA-KEDAINIU GRUDAI TO DECIDE SHARE CAPITAL BOOST.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA-KEDAINIU GRUDAI TO DECIDE SHARE CAPITAL BOOST.

text.p: Lithuanian grain producer Kedainiu Grudai said on Friday that its general shareholders' meeting today is expected to decide on a share capital boost of five million litas.
"We will suggest to the shareholders to approve a new 500,000 ordinary share issue with a face value of 10 litas," the director general of the firm, Jonas Kondrotas, told Reuters.
The current share capital of Kedainiu Grudai, which is on the current list of the Vilnius stock exchange, stands at 8.77 million litas.
"The money raised would be used to increase working capital," Kondrotas added.
